config.borderlessmining.title: Borderless Mining Configuration
Switches to a borderless fullscreen window when Fullscreen is turned on
config.borderlessmining.general.videomod: Adds an option to the Fullscreen Resolution slider that enables the mod
config.borderlessmining.general.enabledm: Disabled by default on macOS, as it has better native fullscreen support; this option does nothing on other systems
config.borderlessmining.dimensions.monit: Use coordinates relative to the monitor, instead of absolute
